title: BONUS: Too Much To Say with Kalie Shorr: Random Tweets of Kindess
itunes:title: BONUS: Too Much To Say with Kalie Shorr: Random Tweets of Kindess
description:
Kalie fills you in on what's going on in her week and how weird it is to be busy again. She shares the best thing she's seen on Twitter this week and answers fan questions from social media.

Follow Kalie at:

Instagram: instagram.com/kalieshorr

Twitter: twitter.com/kalieshorr

Check out Kalie's new single, My Voice, available everywhere now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
